channel.title: Newsletter on LiaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Newsletter on LiaScript

item.title: Newsletter 18/07/2025
item.description: Dear LiaScript community, It has been far too long since our last newsletter — but rest assured, we’ve been busy!

item.title: Newsletter 31/07/2024
item.description: It’s been a while since our last update, and we’ve been busy attending conferences and gathering inspiring ideas to share with you.

item.title: Newsletter 11/04/2024
item.description: … as you might have seen finished 99% of our documentation, so nearly everything, every detail or previously hidden feature is now documented

item.title: Newsletter 04/03/2024
item.description: … since our last newsletter, a lot has happened. For those who missed it, here is the link to our last User Symposium from December 2023:

item.description: This week, on December 6th from 12:00 - 14:00 UTC, in conjunction with the German celebration of St.
